title: Elite
explain: When three working-class teenagers begin attending an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

title: Midsommar
explain: A couple travels to Scandinavia to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

title: A Quiet Plase
explain: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

title: Friends
explain: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

title: Inception
explain: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Matrix
explain: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Interstellar
explain: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Tenet
explain: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

title: The Martian
explain: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

title: Stranger Things
explain: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

title: American Horror Stories
explain: An anthology series of stand alone episodes delving into horror myths, legends and lore.

title: The Walking Dead
explain: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

title: IT
explain: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

title: Us
explain: A family's serene beach vacation turns to chaos when their doppelgängers appear and begin to terrorize them.

title: Get Out
explain: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: Hereditary
explain: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

title: 기생충
explain: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
